issue.title: knuth_b returns wrong value

discussion.p: The 10,000th value returned by knuth_b is supposed to be 1112339016. We get 2126698284.

blockquote.blockquote: Required behavior: The 10000th consecutive invocation of a default-constructed object of type knuth_b shall produce the value 1112339016 2126698284.

issue.note: Bellevue: Submitter withdraws defect. "We got the wrong value for entirely the right reasons". NAD.
